channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Pius Addi
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Pius Addi

item.title: Project III: A Financial Dashboard
item.description: A financial dashboard designed to visualize and analyze stock returns, providing clear insights into performance trends over time. The dashboard offers an intuitive interface for tracking and comparing the returns of various stocks, enabling informed investment decisions. Link to Github repository Link to App

item.title: Project IV: A Web Dashboard for Building Machine learning Models
item.description: A web based machine learning dashboard with the following features: preprocessing numerical and categorical features, imputing missing numerical values, tuning hyper-parameters, cross validation and model building. Link to Github repository Link to App

item.title: Project II: Winning Space Race with Data Science
item.description: Overview Data was collected using API request and web scraping from Wikipedia Applied one-hot encoding to categorical variables Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) using visualization and SQL Perform interactive visual analytics using Folium and Plotly Dash Perform predictive analysis using classification models Link to Github repository Link to App

item.title: Project I:Extracting and Visualizing Stock Data
item.description: Extracting essential data from a dataset and displaying it is a necessary part of data science; therefore individuals can make correct decisions based on the data. In this project, I extracted some stock data, then displayed this data on a dashboard. Overview Used Python libraries and web scraping to extract historical share prices and quarterly revenue reporting. Built a dashboard to clearly visualise stock data for better insights into stock movement Link to Github repository

item.title: About
item.description: Ambitious and results-oriented student with a strong foundation in Actuarial Science, Statistics, and Data Science, seeking an opportunity to leverage analytical skills, statistical techniques, and mathematical methods in a dynamic actuarial or data science role. Experienced as a Research and Teaching Assistant, with a proven track record in the research industry. Proficient in programming, data analysis, and thrives in team environments. Dedicated to pursuing a career as an Actuary or Data Scientist.

item.title: Contact
item.description: I would love to hear from you Platform Link LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/pius-addi-554b56172/ Github: https://github.com/PAADDI Email: awotujara@gmail.com
